desc: We are looking to add the following to our team: Owner Operators needed-Box/Straight trucks & late model cargo vans. DOT & MC number required for 26ft straight trucks. Misskiaj, Inc Freight & Dispatching is a reliable logistics, dispatching and transportation service that specializes in LTL, direct delivery, and last

layout.text:
We welcome owner operators that have their own authority and are willing to be over the road or regional. Our goal is to get you rolling and keep you rolling with consistent top paying loads and backhauls.
We can also help you setup factoring services & file annual reporting for your transportation business.
